body_html: The architecture being used is not one that we currently support. For example, some of the tests are failing with py-cpuinfo currently only works on X86 and some ARM CPUs. Community contributions in keeping TensorFlow chugging along with ppc64le are welcome!
body_text: The architecture being used is not one that we currently support. For example, some of the tests are failing with py-cpuinfo currently only works on X86 and some ARM CPUs. Community contributions in keeping TensorFlow chugging along with ppc64le are welcome!
body: The architecture being used is not one that we currently support. For example, some of the tests are failing with `py-cpuinfo currently only works on X86 and some ARM CPUs`. Community contributions in keeping TensorFlow chugging along with ppc64le are welcome!
